p: Crude methanolic extract of E. suberosa (Roxb) bark and its organic fractions were taken separately in test tubes (2 mL each). Each fraction was treated first with chloroform (2mL) and then concentrated sulfuric acid (2mL). To this solution, dilute acetic acid (few drops) and 3 mL of acetic anhydride were added. Appearance of bluish green color showed the presence of phytosterols.
